Let us help you find the loads you need faster and easier!

Automatic Load Detection
No more clicking refresh, scrolling through, comparing results. We will automatically detect when a new shipment is available.

Google Maps
Plan out your route with a single click, no matter if you have a one-pick-one-drop or a one-pick-ten-drops shipment.

Automatic RPM Calculator
For each shipment that you select, we will automatically calculate the rate per mile so that you can easily compare prices and see if the offer meets your target price.

Copy Load ID
If you need to quickly send a load number to a broker you work with regularly, you can copy the load ID with a single click.

Notifications
Each search window you can individually choose to have new loads automatically opened in a new tab, receive sound notifications, Chrome notifications, or Telegram notifications.

We are an independent company, and we are not affiliated with or controlled by C.H. Robinson in any way.
